00034 #ifndef _SEQ_RANGE_H_
00035 #define _SEQ_RANGE_H_
00036 
00037 #include <lustre/lustre_idl.h>
00038 
00043 static inline unsigned fld_range_type(const struct lu_seq_range *range)
00044 {
00045         return range->lsr_flags & LU_SEQ_RANGE_MASK;
00046 }
00047 
00052 static inline bool fld_range_is_ost(const struct lu_seq_range *range)
00053 {
00054         return fld_range_type(range) == LU_SEQ_RANGE_OST;
00055 }
00056 
00061 static inline bool fld_range_is_mdt(const struct lu_seq_range *range)
00062 {
00063         return fld_range_type(range) == LU_SEQ_RANGE_MDT;
00064 }
00065 
00072 static inline unsigned fld_range_is_any(const struct lu_seq_range *range)
00073 {
00074         return fld_range_type(range) == LU_SEQ_RANGE_ANY;
00075 }
00076 
00081 static inline void fld_range_set_type(struct lu_seq_range *range,
00082                                       unsigned flags)
00083 {
00084         range->lsr_flags |= flags;
00085 }
00086 
00091 static inline void fld_range_set_mdt(struct lu_seq_range *range)
00092 {
00093         fld_range_set_type(range, LU_SEQ_RANGE_MDT);
00094 }
00095 
00100 static inline void fld_range_set_ost(struct lu_seq_range *range)
00101 {
00102         fld_range_set_type(range, LU_SEQ_RANGE_OST);
00103 }
00104 
00109 static inline void fld_range_set_any(struct lu_seq_range *range)
00110 {
00111         fld_range_set_type(range, LU_SEQ_RANGE_ANY);
00112 }
00113 
00118 static inline __u64 lu_seq_range_space(const struct lu_seq_range *range)
00119 {
00120         return range->lsr_end - range->lsr_start;
00121 }
00122 
00127 static inline void lu_seq_range_init(struct lu_seq_range *range)
00128 {
00129         memset(range, 0, sizeof(*range));
00130 }
00131 
00136 static inline bool lu_seq_range_within(const struct lu_seq_range *range,
00137                                        __u64 seq)
00138 {
00139         return seq >= range->lsr_start && seq < range->lsr_end;
00140 }
00141 
00146 static inline bool lu_seq_range_is_sane(const struct lu_seq_range *range)
00147 {
00148         return range->lsr_end >= range->lsr_start;
00149 }
00150 
00155 static inline bool lu_seq_range_is_zero(const struct lu_seq_range *range)
00156 {
00157         return range->lsr_start == 0 && range->lsr_end == 0;
00158 }
00159 
00164 static inline bool lu_seq_range_is_exhausted(const struct lu_seq_range *range)
00165 {
00166         return lu_seq_range_space(range) == 0;
00167 }
00168 
00174 static inline int lu_seq_range_compare_loc(const struct lu_seq_range *r1,
00175                                            const struct lu_seq_range *r2)
00176 {
00177         return r1->lsr_index != r2->lsr_index ||
00178                 r1->lsr_flags != r2->lsr_flags;
00179 }
00180 
00184 #define DRANGE "[%#16.16llx-%#16.16llx]:%x:%s"
00185 
00186 #define PRANGE(range)                           \
00187         (unsigned long long)(range)->lsr_start, \
00188         (unsigned long long)(range)->lsr_end,   \
00189         (range)->lsr_index,                     \
00190         fld_range_is_mdt(range) ? "mdt" : "ost"
00191 
00192 #endif
